channel.title: Azure Static Web Apps on Joost's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Azure Static Web Apps on Joost's blog

item.title: Automatic staging environment creation in Azure Static Web Apps
item.description: Everyone knows that publishing code directly to Production is not the best idea. Azure Static Web Apps offer the ability to automatically create a fully-functional staging environment for you when you want to publish new code.

item.title: Bye bye Wordpress, Hello Hugo
item.description: This site has been running on Wordpress ever since it conception back in 2011. As you might have noticed there is not a lot of new content added over the last couple of years.
